alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 11:16PM CST until February 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR CENTRAL ADAIR AND EAST CENTRAL CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 1116 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Maryetta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Westville... Watts... Adair State Park... Eldon... Proctor... Christie... Baron... Maryetta... Ballard... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
